q1: Do you believe Croatia had a chance against France?
a1: Certainly - they've done far better than anyone might have expected this Cup. Though I still personally believe France will win.
q3: Luka Modric played a great World Cup. Very deserving of the Golden Ball.
a3: They really played their hearts out in the final
q4: What makes Croatia different from the opponents?
a4: They are very resilient and play as a team
q5: Do any of the players on Croatia play in the major leagues?
a5: A few of them, like Lovren.
